transcription: La La La La La! Leonard and I were just learning all about the letter L Whoa, that sentence has a lot of L's in it Leonard starts with the letter L And Leonard, you're a lion Lion starts with the letter L too This is a capital L And this is a lowercase l  L L makes the sound Luh Luh Luh Like Lizard Leaf and Ladybug Do you know what those are? They're lollipops! Lollipop starts with the letter L We have a green lollipop and a yellow lollipop  Green is the color of limes And yellow is the color of lemons Lemon and lime both start with the letter L Leonard loves to lick his lips That sentence has four L's in it Leonard Loves Lick and Lips Can you lick your lips?  This is a capital L And this is a lowercase l L makes the sound luh, luh, luh Like lizard Leaf Ladybug Lollipop Lime Lemon And Leonard the Lion  Rawr! See you later!  you
